# ClientFuse - AI-Friendly Site Information

> ClientFuse is a SaaS tool that helps marketing agencies get instant access to client ad accounts through a single, simple link.

## About ClientFuse

ClientFuse solves the #1 pain point for marketing agencies: getting access to client advertising accounts. Instead of back-and-forth emails explaining complex permission processes, agencies send clients one link that handles everything.

### What ClientFuse Does
- Simplifies client onboarding for marketing agencies
- Provides instant access to Facebook Business Manager, Google Ads, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and more
- Eliminates the need for complex instructions or multiple email exchanges
- Securely manages client account permissions

### Who Uses ClientFuse
- Digital marketing agencies
- Social media management companies
- PPC and paid advertising agencies
- Marketing consultants
- Freelance marketers managing multiple clients

### Key Features
- One-link access requests for all major ad platforms
- Multi-platform support (Facebook, Google, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Snapchat, Amazon)
- Secure permission-based access (no password sharing)
- Client-friendly interface requiring no technical knowledge
- Real-time access status tracking
